name: Night of the Living Pumpkins
description:
Night of the Living Pumpkins is a 2D pixel art-based platformer, that lets you play as a pumpkin on a quest to restore the Pumpkin God to their true power before midnight on Halloween. Explore the temple and help light the candles within your pump-Kin before time runs out!

Credits:

  • Cygnus Mare - Lead Programmer, Level & UI Designer
  • Em Sontheimer - Lead Artist, Narrative Designer & Animator
  • Music - Spook2 by PeriTune : https://peritune.com/

Made for the GCC 2022 In The Dark Game Jam
